long_description: Hit the trail for a fast-paced hike or a long-distance trail run with the FuelBelt R2Outdoor Hydration belt. Includes two 10 fl. oz. polyethylene bottles that are 100% BPA free; bottles are leakproof and dishwasher safe. Zippered pockets secure your cash, credit card and house key; there's also room to stash energy bars and gel. Use the elastic bungee cord to hold your ultralight running jacket. Adjustable waistband has breathable foam padding for great comfort. Rip-and-stick closure at the front makes it easy to get the FuelBelt R2Outdoor Hydration belt on and off.
short_description: Hit the trail for a fast-paced hike or a long-distance trail run with the FuelBelt R2Outdoor Hydration belt.
